Slapping a bit of paint (now mostly worn away) onto a narrow footpath which is in places restricted by trees, hedges and a bus shelter and expecting that pedestrians have to walk single file as whole families on bikes and walkers vie for space is an embarrassment.  This route should be removed until the grass verges can be replaced by a proper segregated cycleway,

marker_response.question: Your Comment

marker_response.question: Your Comment

Here the path is enclosed and narrow and is a busy walking route used to access shops and school. Generally pedestrians and cyclists should not mix.
